init_text:
Should Schools Provide Free Pads and Tampons?

Have you ever experienced period shaming, or â€œperiod poverty"? Should schools step in to help? Should schools be required to provide free pads and tampons to students? How are pads and tampons similar to toilet paper, soap, Band-Aids and other products that are already provided in schools? How are they different?

---

In my opinion,

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: I think that schools should be required to provide free pads and tampons to students because it is a necessity.

actions.name: text-delete
actions.text: . I think that schools should be required to provide free pads and tampons to students

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: Pads and tampons are similar to toilet paper, soap, Band-Aids and other products that are already provided in schools because they

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: They are different because they are a necessity for women.

actions.name: text-delete
actions.text: They are different because they are

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: Period poverty is a term used to describe the lack of access to feminine hygiene products.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: Period poverty is a real issue that affects women and girls around the world.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: According to a study by the United Nations, more than 800 million women and girls around the world lack access to feminine hygiene products.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: This is a huge problem because it can lead to health issues such as infections, reproductive tract infections and cervical cancer.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: Pads and tampons are not a luxury item, they are a necessity.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: The United States government has already taken steps to help women and girls who experience period poverty.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: For example, the United States government has provided feminine hygiene products to women and girls in refugee camps.

actions.name: text-insert
actions.text: I think that schools should provide free pads and tampons to female students with a quota restriction
